attributes.action: Referendum to leave the EU with Mays deal or no deal.
attributes.additional_details:
As we know they will due to the fact that we import more form the EU than we export especially on motor vehicles. 

Theresa May has negotiated a deal with the EU, not a great one but it will satisfy most leavers. Let the people decide whether we accept the Prime minister's deal or believe how great or country can be and leave with no deal.

referendum held 23-6-2016
Result 17.4 million people voted to leave.
attributes.background: On the 23rd June 2016 the Uk held a reforendum to leave the EU. At that point there was no deal on the table and . Although there was no deal on the table the referendum result was that we should leave the EU. This result was based on no deal so we should leave with no deal.
